channel.title: Home on Hi, this is Binh.
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Hi, this is Binh.

item.title: ping 1.1 is the fastest ping
item.description: Today seems like a good day to announce something, start something, or just do anything a bit more “unusual”. So I decided to start writing for this forgotten blog. Also, some company also launching something with a lot of 1 too. And while reading news around it, a little command surprised me: $ ping 1.1 PING 1.1 (1.0.0.1): 56 data bytes 64 bytes from 1.0.0.1: icmp_seq=0 ttl=55 time=5.586 ms 64 bytes from 1.

item.title: Initial Post
item.description: git init git add . git commit -m 'Initial commit' It’s a new Hello World.
